1.0.name: wordpress/assign-missing-categories
1.0.description: If you have converted categories to tags and are now left with a lot of posts that have no category assigned (that show up with 'Uncategorized,' unlinked, as the category under Posts), you can use this plugin to assign the default category to all those posts at once.
